actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Buildings Act of 1959 to require the Administrator of General Services to prioritze construction and alteration projects in accordance with merit-based needs criteria, and for other purposes.
short_title: Federal Buildings Construction and Alteration Funding Improvement Act

summary.text: Federal Buildings Construction and Alteration Funding Improvement Act - Amends the Public Buildings Act of 1959 to require the President to include as part of the annual Federal budget submission to the Congress a list, in order of need, of public building construction and alteration projects for which funds are requested. Directs the Administrator of General Services to promulgate merit-based criteria for determining relative need. Requires reports to the Congress on building project surveys to specify the relative need for a project.

titles.title: Federal Buildings Construction and Alteration Funding Improvement Act

A bill to amend the Public Buildings Act of 1959 to require the Administrator of General Services to prioritze construction and alteration projects in accordance with merit-based needs criteria, and for other purposes.
